name: Khanh Nguyen 0001
content: Khanh Nguyen – CSE@TAMU Skip to primary navigation Skip to main contentMenu I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science & Engineering at Texas A&M University. My research aims to develop practical techniques to solve scalability issues in Big Data systems, including ML workloads. Specifically, I am interested in developing programming language extensions, compiler and runtime support to improve system performance in terms of resource efficiency, workload scalability, and tail latency.
